synopsis.text: Hamitang, the adorable baby, takes center stage in this enlightening anime series, tackling complex issues from the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) with an engaging and accessible approach. From global warming to food waste and gender equality, Hamitang breaks down these topics into easy-to-digest lessons, ensuring even the youngest viewers can comprehend their importance. As our pint-sized protagonist unravels these challenges, prepare to be both entertained and informed on the crucial matters shaping our world today. Join Hamitang and embark on a journey towards a sustainable future!
